backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing scam report storage, querying, and statistics with type definitions and scam-type comparison.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file listing high-level summaries of all major frontend source files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining OKLCH color variables for light and dark mode themes.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML file mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/scripts/EXPORT_ARTIFACT.md: Explains export archive contents, structure, formats, and script behavior for source code exports.
frontend/scripts/export-source-code.ps1: PowerShell script creating a full ZIP archive of the repository with staging and cleanup steps.
frontend/scripts/export-source-code.sh: Shell script generating a tar.gz source archive by staging and packaging project files.
frontend/SOURCE_CODE_EXPORT.md: Documentation guiding users through exporting, setting up, and running the project locally.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router with all app routes wrapped in AppLayout.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Layout component adding navigation, content container, and footer with Caffeine attribution.
frontend/src/components/AppNav.tsx: Responsive navigation bar with desktop buttons and a mobile sheet menu using router state to highlight active links.
frontend/src/components/Branding.tsx: Logo and wordmark components displaying the appâ€™s branding.
frontend/src/components/ReportsDashboard: Dashboard card showing scam report stats with loading, error, and formatted data states.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Initializes and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity and invalidates queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and utilities for managing Internet Identity authentication and status.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for fetching stats and submitting reports via the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base setup with custom light/dark theme variables and global styles.
frontend/src/lib/riskDetector.ts: Analyzes text for risk keywords and returns a risk level with detected indicators.
frontend/src/lib/riskQuiz.ts: Defines quiz questions and calculates a risk score and level based on user answers.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point setting up React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/BrowserExtensionConce: Concept page describing a future browser extension with detection, warning, and recommendation mockups.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Landing page with hero section, CTAs, and examples illustrating common digital dark patterns.
frontend/src/pages/PersonalDigitalRiskTe: Interactive quiz page that calculates a vulnerability score and displays personalized safety tips.
frontend/src/pages/ScamReportingPage.tsx: Form page for submitting scam reports with category selection, validation, and success/error states.
frontend/src/pages/SubscriptionTrapDetec: Tool page allowing users to paste offer text and receive a risk analysis for subscription traps.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme extensions, colors, animations, and plugins for the project.
project_state.json: Contains project metadata, architectural decisions, and a list of implemented features for the DarkPattern Shield web app. Provides high-level build context including tech stack, logic constraints, and existing functionality.
